content: materials to make one flowerfield hand towel you will need * main color mc 1 ball of purl soho s 100-gram cotton chirp dk 1 100% peruvian pima cotton yarn each ball of this light worsted/dk weight yarn is 232 yards/ 100g approximately 232 yards required we used heirloom white * contrast colors 1 4 1 of purl soho s cotton chirp dk mini bundles 2 100% peruvian pima cotton each bundle includes four 58-yard 25-gram balls of light worsted/dk weight yarn approximately 232 total yards required we used the wild poppy mint citrus and ebb tide bundles * us 5 3 75 mm straight 3 or 24-inch circular knitting needles 4 * if using straight needles two us 5 double pointed needles 5 for i-cord gauge 23 stitches and 43 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern note we used every last yard for our hand towels to avoid running short be sure to check your gauge avoid cutting your swatch yarn and reuse it and keep tails short size finished dimensions approximately 15 inches wide x 25½ inches long designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 6 see more of gianna s designs on her instagram 7 all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-chirp-dk html 2 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-chirp-dk-minis html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html collection_filter=23802 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
